name: tootik
description: Tootik is a self-hosted microblogging platform implementing ActivityPub, enabling federated social networking. It provides timelines, posts, and interactions via a simple, lightweight web UI.

features.title: Microblogging
features.description: Post short updates, thoughts, and content to share with followers across the fediverse

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Run efficiently with minimal resource requirements suitable for personal or small community instances

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Access your social network through a simple, straightforward web interface

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Control post visibility with public, unlisted, followers-only, or direct message options
